sentences.en: an essay full of spelling mistakes
sentences.cn: 一篇满是拼写错误的文章

sentences.en: Apart from some spelling mistakes, the composition is fairly good.
sentences.cn: 除了一些拼写错误, 这篇文章写得很不错.

sentences.en: Check and double-check spelling and punctuation.
sentences.cn: 要反复检查拼写和标点符号。

sentences.en: Grammatical errors are always obvious to me, spelling mistakes stand out.
sentences.cn: 语法错误对我来说总是非常明显，而拼写错误也很显眼。

sentences.en: I thought a phonetic spelling might aid in pronunciation.
sentences.cn: 我想语音拼写可能有助于发音。

sentences.en: Marks were given for accurate spelling and punctuation.
sentences.cn: 因拼写及标点正确而得分。

sentences.en: Spelling mistakes are often just the result of haste.
sentences.cn: 拼写错误经常是由于匆忙而造成的。

sentences.en: The book deals with some of the oddities of grammar and spelling.
sentences.cn: 这本书专讲语法和拼写方面的某些不规则现象。

sentences.en: The teacher told the student to pay attention to his spelling.
sentences.cn: 老师提醒那个学生要注意拼法.

sentences.en: Words like " believe " and " receive " are a source of confusion in spelling.
sentences.cn: 诸如believe和receive这样的词在拼写上容易混淆.

sentences.en: You will be penalized for poor spelling.
sentences.cn: 你拼写不好将会受到处罚。

sentences.en: Your bad spelling may prejudice your chances of getting this job.
sentences.cn: 你糟糕的拼写会妨碍你获得这个工作的机会.

sentences.en: Your composition is well written except for a few spelling mistakes.
sentences.cn: 你的作文除了几处拼写错误外,写得很好.

words.tran_cn: 被咒语所镇住的；出神的；被迷住的；茫然不知所之的
拼，拼写；意味着；招致；拼成；迷住；轮值
拼写；意味着（spell的ing形式）；迷住

trans.tran_en: the act of spelling words correctly, or the ability to do this

trans.tran_cn: 拼写( spell的现在分词)，意味着
